testcase.name: Verify all courses from homepages (names and professors)

failure.message: Course Master thesis does not have a professor.

testcase.failure:
Given the user is on the Ansymo homepage....................................passed When the user clicks the "Courses" link in the menu section.................passed Then the user should see a page with all the courses listed.................passed And for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor.failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Course Master thesis does not have a professor. at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertFalse(Assert.java:65) at pageObjects.CoursesPage.selectEachCourseAndVerifyDetails(CoursesPage.java:107) at stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.verifyCourseAndProfessorNames(BrowseCoursesSteps.java:106) at ✽.for each course, there should be a page that is loaded and there should be a professor(file:///C:/ST/AnsymoBDD2/src/test/resources/features/BrowseCourses.feature:12)

testcase.name: Verify Assignment Links in Software Testing Course
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Software Testing course page.......................passed When the user sees the links for each assignment............................passed Then the user should verify the link format of each assignment link.........passed And the user should verify the document existence of each assignment link...passed

testcase.name: Verify Student Groups in Software Testing Course

failure.message: The student is not in any group

testcase.failure:
Given the user is on the Software Testing course page.......................passed When the user says that a student "Luna Geens" belongs to student group 1...passed Then the user should be in a student group..................................failed And the user should receive a warning when he does not belong to that student group number.skipped
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The student is not in any group at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at org.junit.Assert.assertFalse(Assert.java:65) at stepdefinitions.BrowseCoursesSteps.theUserShouldBeInAStudentGroup(BrowseCoursesSteps.java:162) at ✽.the user should be in a student group(file:///C:/ST/AnsymoBDD2/src/test/resources/features/BrowseCourses.feature:28)
